fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 The price of £50 per person buys a panto-break in Canterbury. Stay in the four-star County Hotel (01227 766266), B&B, and get a ticket to Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs . Valid for any night up to 25 January, with up to two under-14s sharing with parents can stay free (just paying for meals and theatre tickets). A half-term family special at Pontin's (0870 604 5606) Blackpool holiday centre is £99 between 16-20 February with entertainment including The Sooty Show and Barney the Dinosaur, plus for adults, appearances by The Real Thing. Price is for each of two adults sharing a one-bedroom apartment with up to two children paying half price. Under £400 Get in touch with your inner Barbara Cartland on a romantic writing weekend in a Scottish castle. A successful Mills and Boon novelist will let guests into the secrets of romantic fiction in the beautiful setting of the Castle of Park (01466 751 111) near Moray Firth. The course runs from 25-28 March and costs £350. Under £700 A snow safari in Lapland is £634 per person with two sharing with Scandinavia Freestyle (020 8846 2622). Depart Heathrow or Manchester on Saturday 17, 24 or 30 January for seven nights in Luosto, Finland. Stay at the three-star Hotel Luostotunturi complete with a Finnish Sauna. Price includes flights, B&B and transfers. Under £800 Stay for seven nights at the two-star Rex Turtle Beach, Tobago, from £799 per person for travel to 31 January. The price includes return BA flights (0870 2433 406) from Gatwick, all-inclusive accommodation and transfers.
